name: 黃如瑩
objective: 本課程透過希臘英雄的偉大冒險故事以及希伯來聖經傳統中的聖哲事蹟來探索早期西方文明的兩大源頭（希臘與希伯來文化）所呈現出的主要風貌。

scorePolicy:
What are the requirements of this class?
1.Attendance (20%): Each absence (w/o proper reasons) costs 5%.
2.Class participation and group discussions (20%)
3.Mid-term examination (30%):  a test on the Greek culture  and literature
4.Final project (30%):
(1) academic:  research paper
(2) creative:  adaptation into play scripts, illustrations for stories, short film
